title: Moments of a random variable arising Laplacian random variable
abstract:
Let X be the Laplacian random variable with parameters (a,b)=(0,1), and let
X1, X2, X3 , ...be a sequence of mutually independent copies of X$. In this
note, we explicitly determine the moments of the Laplacian random variable in
terms of the Bernoulli and Euler numbers.
